name: nlcst-to-string
description: Transform a Natural Language Concrete Syntax Tree (NLCST) node into a string
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports spec/nlcst-to-string.spec.js
scripts.lint: npm run-script lint-api && npm run-script lint-test && npm run-script lint-style
scripts.lint-api: node_modules/.bin/eslint index.js --env node --env browser --rule 'quotes: [2, single], consistent-return: false'
scripts.lint-test: node_modules/.bin/eslint spec/nlcst-to-string.spec.js --env node --env mocha --rule 'quotes: [2, single], no-loop-func: false'
scripts.make: npm run-script lint && npm run-script coverage
